title: Trace a Missing Railcar
description: A customer is asking for the location of their railcar, but it is not showing up at its expected location. An agent must trace it.

tasks.description: Get the railcar's ID number from the customer.
Query the inter-railroad CLM (Car Location Message) database for the latest reported sighting of the car.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns the last reported location and time.

tasks.description: The last sighting shows the car was delivered to a different railroad's yard. The agent must now check that railroad's system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the need to check a partner system.

tasks.description: Contact the other railroad's customer service to get the current status and ETA for the car.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent gets an update from the partner railroad and can now inform the customer.
